Uses of Class
chess.Board

  • Packages that use Board 
    Package Description
    chess
    Provides classes to run a 2 player chess game.
    pieces
    Provides classes to store different chess piece typed classes.

    • Uses of Board in chess

      Modifier and Type Method Description
      Board Board.copy()
      Copy's game state into another instance of the Board class.

      Method to handle resignations, draws to end the game.

      Gets the user input to move a piece "FileRank FileRank ...".
